BCC:

Subject: FW: EID videographer
--------------------------------------------------
Hi all,

 

I am reaching out as we are in the process of applying for a license for a location shoot with a videographer from the One Studio team next Tuesday at the Mall of the Emirates, and need to confirm if we carry specific insurance to cover third party liability and property damage?

 

We would ideally be able to get back to them today to make sure they issue the license in time for the shoot.

 

Thanks,

Eva

 

 

EVA DIETRICH​​​​

MANAGER ‑ PRODUCTION

C.G.R. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

We would ideally be able to get back to them today to make sure they issue the license in time for the shoot.

 

Thanks,

Eva

 

 

EVA DIETRICH​​​​

C.G.R. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
